chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
r: nat
p: nat
n: nat
q: nat

Goal:
q = n * p + r -> rem q p = rem r p

Premises:
rem = fun q p : nat => proj1_sig (projT2 (div_full q p)) : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments rem (_ _)%nat_scope
rem_prop : forall q p n r : nat, q = n * p + r -> r < p -> rem q p = r
div_prop : forall q p n r : nat, q = n * p + r -> r < p -> div q p = n
div_rem_spec1 : forall q p : nat, q = div q p * p + rem q p
rem_idem : forall q p : nat, q < p -> rem q p = q
Nat.sqrt_iter_spec : forall k p q r : nat, q = p + p -> r <= q -> let s := Nat.sqrt_iter k p q r in s * s <= k + p * p + (q - r) < S s * S s
Nat.log2_iter_spec : forall k p q r : nat, 2 ^ S p = q + S r -> r < 2 ^ p -> let s := Nat.log2_iter k p q r in 2 ^ s <= k + q < 2 ^ S s
Nat.mod_unique : forall a b q r : nat, r < b -> a = b * q + r -> r = a mod b
Nat.div_unique : forall a b q r : nat, r < b -> a = b * q + r -> q = a / b
is_gcd_plus : forall p q r : nat, is_gcd p q r -> is_gcd p (q + p) r
is_gcd_moduplus : forall p q k r : nat, divides p k -> is_gcd p q r -> is_gcd p (q + k) r
div_rem_spec2 : forall q p : nat, p <> 0 -> rem q p < p
Nat.divide_mul_split : forall n m p : nat, n <> 0 -> Nat.divide n (m * p) -> exists q r : nat, n = q * r /\ Nat.divide q m /\ Nat.divide r p
is_lcm_sym : forall p q r : nat, is_lcm p q r -> is_lcm q p r
is_gcd_sym : forall p q r : nat, is_gcd p q r -> is_gcd q p r
is_gcd_mult : forall p q r n : nat, is_gcd p (n * p + q) r < -> is_gcd p q r
div_full : forall q p : nat, {n : nat & {r : nat | q = n * p + r /\ (p <> 0 -> r < p)}}
is_gcd_minus : forall p q r : nat, p <= q -> is_gcd p q r -> is_gcd p (q - p) r
is_lcm = fun p q r : nat => divides p r /\ divides q r /\ (forall k : nat, divides p k -> divides q k -> divides r k) : nat -> nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments is_lcm (_ _ _)%nat_scope
is_gcd_modulus : forall p q k r : nat, divides p k -> k <= q -> is_gcd p q r -> is_gcd p (q - k) r
rem_0 : forall q : nat, rem q 0 = q
is_gcd = fun p q r : nat => divides r p /\ divides r q /\ (forall k : nat, divides k p -> divides k q -> divides k r) : nat -> nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments is_gcd (_ _ _)%nat_scope
mult_is_one : forall p q : nat, p * q = 1 -> p = 1 /\ q = 1
bezout_sc : forall p q a b m : nat, a * p + b * q = 1 + m -> divides p m \/ divides q m -> is_gcd p q 1
rem_rem : forall x m : nat, rem (rem x m) m = rem x m
is_lcm_plus : forall p q g l u : nat, p = u * g -> is_gcd p q g -> is_lcm p q l -> is_lcm p (q + p) (l + u * p)
euclid : forall n d : nat, d <> 0 -> {q : nat & {r : nat | n = q * d + r /\ r < d}}
is_lcm_moduplus : forall k p q g l u : nat, p = u * g -> is_gcd p q g -> is_lcm p q l -> is_lcm p (q + k * p) (l + k * u * p)
bezout_rel_prime_lt : forall p q : nat, 0 < p < q -> is_gcd p q 1 -> {a : nat & {b : nat | a * p + b * q = 1 + p * q /\ a <= q /\ b <= p}}
is_gcd_lcm_mult : forall p q g l : nat, is_gcd p q g -> is_lcm p q l -> p * q = g * l
is_gcd_mult_lcm : forall p q g l : nat, g <> 0 -> is_gcd p q g -> g * l = p * q -> is_lcm p q l
is_gcd_0 : forall p q : nat, is_gcd p q 0 -> p = 0 /\ q = 0
is_lcm_minus : forall p q g l u : nat, p <= q -> p = u * g -> is_gcd p q g -> is_lcm p q l -> is_lcm p (q - p) (l - u * p)
is_lcm_modulus : forall k p q g l u : nat, k * p <= q -> p = u * g -> is_gcd p q g -> is_lcm p q l -> is_lcm p (q - k * p) (l - k * u * p)
Init.Nat.log2_iter = fix log2_iter (k p q r : nat) {struct k} : nat := match k with | 0 => p | S k' => match r with | 0 => log2_iter k' (S p) (S q) q | S r' => log2_iter k' p (S q) r' end end : nat -> nat -> nat -> nat -> nat Arguments Init.Nat.log2_iter (_ _ _ _)%nat_scope
bezout_generalized_lt : forall p q : nat, 0 < p < q -> {a : nat & {b : nat & {g : nat & {l : nat & {u : nat & {v : nat | a * p + b * q = g + l /\ is_gcd p q g /\ is_lcm p q l /\ p = u * g /\ q = v * g /\ a <= v /\ b <= u}}}}}}
Init.Nat.sqrt_iter = fix sqrt_iter (k p q r : nat) {struct k} : nat := match k with | 0 => p | S k' => match r with | 0 => sqrt_iter k' (S p) (S (S q)) (S (S q)) | S r' => sqrt_iter k' p q r' end end : nat -> nat -> nat -> nat -> nat Arguments Init.Nat.sqrt_iter (_ _ _ _)%nat_scope
is_gcd_rel_prime : forall p q g : nat, is_gcd p q g -> exists a b : nat, p = a * g /\ q = b * g /\ is_gcd a b 1
is_gcd_fun : forall p q r1 r2 : nat, is_gcd p q r1 -> is_gcd p q r2 -> r1 = r2
plus_le_compat : forall n m p q : nat, n <= m -> p <= q -> n + p <= m + q
div_rem_uniq : forall p n1 r1 n2 r2 : nat, p <> 0 -> n1 * p + r1 = n2 * p + r2 -> r1 < p -> r2 < p -> n1 = n2 /\ r1 = r2

```coq
intros. intros Hq.
rewrite div_rem_spec1 with (n:=n) (r:=r) in Hq. 2:lia.
rewrite div_prop with (n:=n) (r:=r) in Hq. 2:lia.
rewrite rem_idem in Hq. 2:lia.
assumption.
Qed.
```

original: intros. intros Hq. rewrite div_rem_spec1 with (n:=n) (r:=r) in Hq. 2:lia. rewrite div_prop with (n:=n) (r:=r) in Hq. 2:lia. rewrite rem_idem in Hq. 2:lia. auto.
